views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10

Dock+: Drag&drop the dock in any apps. A multi-tasking tweak inspired by iOS 11, but more than it.

⚠️Try the tweak before purchasing please!

If you want to try,use other tool to download it or ask me for free copied (With E-mail).
If you have no PayPal/AliPay account, you can ask me for free copied. (E-mail)
If you have Dock+ For iPad installed on your other devices and want to download the iPhone version, you can ask me for free copied. (E-mail)

Support 5 icons with 4.7'&5.5' device.

Dock + Gesture
You can launch Dock+ with gesture. After recognizing gesture, Dock+ will show on the bottom of screen.

Dock + App
Tap the app in Dock+ will launch the app directly.
Tap folder icon in Dock+ will show you the apps in folder, you can scroll between apps.
Long press the app, even the apps in folders, after the window appearing, Dock+ will host the app in this window.

Dock + Window
There are four buttons on the windows of Dock+.
Red Button: close the window.
Yellow button: reduce the alpha of the window.
Green button: launch the app in full screen mode.
Arrow button: tap the button, than you can pinch to scale the window.

Requires Activator

Configure options from Settings.

This item is now Free. Fixed crash when dragging icons into folders.
Fixed crash when dragging icons out of folders.
Fixed home button laggy problems.
More stable.
More smooth.
And now we have built-in gesture, you can choose between it and activator.
Fix some bugs.
Fix some problems with iPhone 4s.
More smooth, even on some old devices like iPhone 4s/5/5c.
Fixed some bugs in iOS 8/9. Fixed some problems about color tint.


Fixed some bugs which may cause check enabled.


New dock experiences, a modern way to multi-tasking, supports iOS 8/9/10 now.

All features, Dock+ App/Window/Gesture/Drawer are working well on iOS 8/9 devices.

Fixed some problems when closing Dock+ Window.
Fixed laggy problems.
Fixed some animation problems.
Fixed some laggy problems when closing apps.
Dock + Drawer (Beta)
App Drawer can show all apps include folded apps.


Dock + Drawer (Beta)
Swipe up on Dock+ in apps, App Drawer will show. You can directly open apps on home screen in App Drawer or long press it to open in Dock+ Window.

Dock color can be changed now.
Added an option to use Touch ID to protect your apps in Dock + App page.(Beta)
⚠️⚠️⚠️Fixed the source check!!! Should update to this version!!!
Fixed some problems about folders in Dock+.
